title: First principles design of two dimensional TiSSe Janus drug delivery system for nitrosourea
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31433-31438
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05119J, Paper

Diwei Shi, Zhengwei Yan, Shiyu Du
We investigated a new drug delivery system for nitrosourea using a two-dimensional carrier with a Janus structure TiSSe through systematic first principles calculations.
